# Online Image Shrinker

> Free, privacy-first image tools that run entirely in your browser. No uploads, no accounts, no tracking.

## About

Online Image Shrinker is a suite of 20+ free image manipulation tools powered by WebAssembly and TensorFlow.js. Every tool processes images locally on the user's device — zero bytes are sent to any server. The site supports 6 languages (English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian) and works offline as a PWA.

## Core Tools

- **Image Compressor** — Reduce JPEG, PNG, WebP file sizes by up to 90%
- **AI Background Remover** — Remove backgrounds using browser-based ML
- **AI Image Upscaler** — 2x/4x resolution enhancement via neural networks
- **Image Converter** — Convert between JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC
- **Crop & Resize** — Presets for Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, Passport
- **Images to PDF** — Merge multiple images into a single PDF
- **Privacy Blur / Redactor** — Blur faces, text, and sensitive data
- **EXIF Metadata Remover** — Strip GPS coordinates and camera data
- **Screenshot Beautifier** — Add backgrounds, frames, and shadows
- **Profile Picture Maker** — AI background removal + custom styling
- **Meme Generator** — Classic top/bottom text meme creator
- **QR Code Generator** — Create QR codes from any URL or text
- **Instagram Grid Splitter** — Split images into 3x3 or 3x1 grids
- **Photo Filters** — Apply Instagram-style filters
- **Image Compare** — Side-by-side slider comparison tool
- **Social Media Preview Generator** — Create platform-ready images
- **Collage Maker** — Combine multiple photos into layouts
- **Video to GIF / Audio** — Extract GIF or audio from video files
- **OCR Text Extractor** — Extract text from images using Tesseract.js
- **Digital Signature** — Draw and export signatures as transparent PNGs
- **Batch Processor** — Process multiple images at once
- **Color Palette Extractor** — Extract dominant colors from images
- **Magic Eraser** — Remove objects from photos using AI

## Privacy Model

All processing uses client-side technologies:
- WebAssembly (WASM) for compression and format conversion
- TensorFlow.js and ONNX Runtime for AI features
- Canvas API for image manipulation
- No server-side processing, no data collection, no accounts required

## URL: https://onlineimageshrinker.com
## Sitemap: https://onlineimageshrinker.com/sitemap.xml
